turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Another Dawn (1937 film).
turn.1: What is Another Dawn (1937 film) about?
turn.2: Another Dawn (1937 film)  Another Dawn ( Caesar's Wife) is a 1937 American film melodrama starring Errol Flynn and Kay Francis, based on Somerset Maugham's play "Caesar's Wife".
turn.4: The film was directed by William Dieterle.
turn.5: What deserts the film take place in?
turn.6: Colonel John Wister (Ian Hunter) is in charge of a post in the British desert colony of Dickit.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: While on leave in England he meets and falls in love with the beautiful American Julia Ashton (Kay Francis), whose aviator fiancé died in an aircraft accident.
turn.9: Do they get married in the end?
turn.10: Although Julia does not love John, she likes him and agrees to his marriage proposal.
turn.11: What happens after she agrees to his proposal?
turn.12: John takes Julia to Dickit, where she meets John's best friend, Captain Denny Roark (Errol Flynn), and Denny's sister, Grace (Frieda Inescort), who is secretly in love with John.
